typeSystemDescription.name: Entailment Types
typeSystemDescription.description: Types that are needed to express entailment problems.

typeDescription.name: eu.excitement.type.entailment.Decision
typeDescription.description: String subtype that describe entailment Decision. *Note*: If you extend/change this type, you *MUST* also update "enum TEDecision" in the entailment core.

typeDescription.name: eu.excitement.type.entailment.Text
typeDescription.description: This type represents a text part of a T-H pair. This type annotates a text item within the TextView. It can occur multiple times (for multi-text problems).

typeDescription.name: eu.excitement.type.entailment.Hypothesis
typeDescription.description: This type represents a hypothesis part of a T-H pair. This type annotates a hypoth- esis item within the HypothesisView. It can occur multiple times (for multi-hypothesis problems)

typeDescription.name: eu.excitement.type.entailment.Pair
typeDescription.description: This type represents a text-hypothesis pair.

featureDescription.name: pairID
featureDescription.description: ID of this pair. The main purpose of this value is to distinguish a certain pair among multiple pairs.

featureDescription.name: text
featureDescription.description: This feature points a Text instance, which rep- resents the text part of this pair.

featureDescription.name: hypothesis
featureDescription.description: This feature points a Hypothesis instance, which represents the hypothesis part of this pair.

typeDescription.name: eu.excitement.type.entailment.EntailmentMetadata
typeDescription.description: This type provides metadata for entailment problem.

featureDescription.name: task
featureDescription.description: This string holds the task description which can be found in the RTE challenge data.

featureDescription.name: channel
featureDescription.description: his feature can holds a string that shows the channel where this problem was originated. For example, "customer e-mail", "online forum", or " customer transcription", etc.

featureDescription.name: origin
featureDescription.description: This metadata field can hold a string that shows the origin of this text and hypothesis. A company name, or a product name.

featureDescription.name: TextDocumentID
featureDescription.description: This field can hold a string that identifies the doc- ument of the TextView. This feature must have a value, if TextCollectionID is not null.

featureDescription.name: TextCollectionID
featureDescription.description: This field can hold a string that identifies the collection name where the document of the TextView belongs to.

featureDescription.name: HypothesisDocumentID
featureDescription.description: This field can hold a string that identifies the document of the HypothesisView. This feature must have a value, if HypothesisCollec- tionID is not null.

featureDescription.name: HypothesisCollectionID
featureDescription.description: This field can hold a string that identi- fies the collection name where the document of the HypothesisView belongs to.
